text: The Tank 400 is a mid-size SUV made by Tank a brand of Great Wall Motors since 2023. == History and Features == The Tank 400 alongside the Tank 500 was launched at the Auto Shanghai in 2021. and put on sale in China in August 2023. its the second car from the Tank brand to be launched the 400 has a 2.0 liter turbo petrol engine the SUV also has a Plug-in hybrid version both versions have a 9-speed automatic transmission. == Markets == The Tank 400 is currently sold only in the Chinese Market. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Tank 400
